participant_1.background:
I want a home where I can entertain my friends and play my Lindsey Stirling albums loud.
I want to have more fun with my siblings.
i work five days a week.
i enjoy karaoke every friday night.
i like to bake.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy cooking up a storm on the weekends and running to clear my head.
i lost my arm in a car accident.
I am a caring and giving person who uses my talents to help others.
i work as a librarian.
I grew up watching my mom make mashed potatoes, and I still love them to this day.

content.text: Hey there!
Hello!
What do you like to do on the weekends?
I like to cook up a storm and run to clear my head.
That sounds fun! Do you have a favorite recipe?
I love mashed potatoes! I grew up watching my mom make them and I still love them to this day.
Mashed potatoes are so good! What kind of toppings do you like on them?
I like butter, sour cream, and a little bit of chives.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a classic for a reason.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I also like to read and write. I'm a librarian, so I'm always looking for new books to read.
That's cool! I love reading too. I'm always looking for new authors to discover.
Me too! I like to read all different kinds of genres. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
That's a great genre! I love learning about different time periods and cultures.
Me too! It's so interesting to see how people lived in different eras.
I agree! It's really cool to be able to experience different cultures and time periods through books.
It is! I'm glad I met you. We seem to have a lot in common.
Me too! I'm glad we met too
